title: Usdt2023
author: Usdt2023
content: I am offering the service of making your purchases at a 20% discount in the entire Shein store Minimum purchase in Shein store Shipping: Only to the USA -There is no maximum in the purchase, since it will depend on my capital -I will send you an account to add the article/product to the cart -Free shipping is valid if you spend +$129 -Shipments have an estimated 7-10 days to reach their destination -The custumer will always be updated on his order.Escrow accepted until your purchase arrive
